products.title: Devon Whisper White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Taking influence from soft cloth fabric weaves, their devon range of vertical blinds provide a stunning textured finish for your window dressing. Whisper white is a stylish, soft white shade. Contemporary and modern this will be a welcome addition to home interiors. Product id: sdb-vtb1408 fabric colour: whisper white material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes devon whisper white 89mm vertical blind in white.

products.title: Devon Sandstone 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Taking influence from soft cloth fabric weaves, their devon range of vertical blinds provide a stunning textured finish for your window dressing. Sand will introduce a stylish, earthy shade into your interiors. A fabulously warm grey/brown hue. Product id: sdb-vtb1407 fabric colour: sandstone material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes devon sandstone 89mm vertical blind in brown.

products.title: Devon Shadow Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Devon, a beautiful, soft and sophisticated pattern, which gives your home a warm feeling. A great addition. This grey vertical blind is ideal to add some effortless chic to any room in your home without breaking the bank. Product id: sdb-vtb0945 fabric colour: shadow grey material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes devon shadow grey 89mm vertical blind in grey.

products.title: Devon Shadow
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 3500mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open and close blind coordinated with headrail colour, chrome chain to tilt louvres. Controls can be positioned on the left or right. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
